channel.title: Dicing on 667 load 711
channel.description: does anyone know how to add dicing on a 667 loading 711? we have the dice, but how do we make them roll-able?

item.title: Dicing on 667 load 711
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

to answer the question, you need to put the old dice itemdef into the client cache. problem solved. or modify the current itemdef to have the correct options.

Read full topic
